name: AG-Composite Molecular Condenser
description:
The AG-Composite Molecular Condenser is a molecular-forging tool used with a specific combination of chemicals obtained from stellar gas clouds. The processes using this tool can produce some of the most complex and potent pharmaceutical chemicals available.

Molecular-forging tools are cutting-edge technologies developed by leading corporations in the core empires' space-industrial complexes. Inevitably, some of these technological wonders have fallen into the hands of criminals and renegade factions.
